site.title: Mega Template
site.description: A powerful Astro template with React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and i18n support
site.keywords: astro, react, typescript, tailwind, i18n, template
site.name: TechFlow

testimonials.section_description: Hear from developers and teams who have built amazing projects with our template.

featured.quote: This template has been a game-changer for our development workflow. The accessibility features and TypeScript support saved us weeks of development time. Highly recommended for any serious web project.

grid.quote1: The i18n support is fantastic. We launched our product in 5 languages without any hassle. The component library is well-designed and easy to customize.
grid.quote2: Outstanding performance and accessibility features. Our Lighthouse scores improved dramatically after switching to this template.
grid.quote3: Clean code, excellent documentation, and responsive design out of the box. Perfect for rapid prototyping and production apps.

card.quote: Incredible attention to detail and developer experience. The best Astro template I've used.

minimal.quote: Simple, elegant, and powerful. Everything I needed for my project.
